response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. Considering its worth to you and my understanding of your financial capabilities, I am offering this product at a special price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its intrinsic value, aiming to make it more accessible to you while ensuring a fair return for me. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need any further information about the product. I am looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
